articles.title: 2026 NFL Mock Draft roundup: 7 names for Patriots fans to know entering combine week
articles.description:
The Patriots hold the No. 31 pick in the 2026 NFL Draft.

The post 2026 NFL Mock Draft roundup: 7 names for Patriots fans to know entering combine week appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots hold the No. 31 pick in the 2026 NFL Draft.
Seven potential draft prospects highlighted for fans ahead of the combine.
Local fans can anticipate key player additions to strengthen the team.
